Text.val: 29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
12.01.2007 SH SCR12209 Removed module to create TX52 rows, now done in BPH262

03.05.2006 SH SCR11092 Changed calls of BXA003 versions, see R.S. in task
"Process BTPC" for more details
22.12.2005 SH SCR9736 If GNRL_CODE = DE then the new version of BXA003 is called
same as already done for GNRL_CODE = NL
10.10.2005 SH SCR9249 If GNRL_CODE = NL then the new version of BXA003 is called
now, see also SCR 6266.

COUT202_REPORTTYPE = 'OJF'

29.01.2004 SH SCR5409 Extended test to write TEMP_BXA052 rows

-changed link create of store TX52 to link write
26.02.2003 JJ SCR3070 fixed store TX52 for "ZAD" instead of "ZDA"

- table "TEMP_BXA052 "

25.07.2002 SCR1740 SH Perform the call of BXA052 only if CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = N
// 18-06-2002 JP change parameter to type= 304 due to submit server job call
Parameter date = 0/null use GNRL_DATE
-- in case of GNRL_CODE='NL' call BXA003 version without using DEBH fields in
order by of BTPC rows in BXA003
-- in case of GNRL_CODE<>'NL' call BXA003 version with using DEBH fields in
